stepAnswer: Translate right by $$4$$, then stretch horizontally by 2; order does not matter
answerLatex: Translate right by $$4$$, then stretch horizontally by 2; order does not matter
choices: Translate right by $$4$$, then stretch horizontally by 2; order does not matter
Translate left by $$4$$, then stretch vertically by 2; order does not matter
Translate right by $$4$$, then stretch horizontally by 2; order does matter
Translate left by $$4$$, then stretch vertically by 2; order does matter
